Jordan says Israel's Al-Aqsa mosque restrictions risk 'explosion'Jordan's Foreign Minister Ayman Safadi said on Monday restrictions imposed by Israel on Muslim worshippers' access to Jerusalem's Al-Aqsa Mosque compound during the Muslim fasting month was pushing the situation towards an "explosion". Mon, 11 Mar 2024 15:03:47 GMT YQTO7IWVUFL4RMWI4HALHKQAOA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-says-israel-al-aqsa-mosque-restrictions-risk-explosion-2024-03-11/Suleiman Al-Khalidi世界中东地区
Therapy dogs comfort passengers at Istanbul AirportStressed before a big flight? Therapy dogs are now on hand at Istanbul Airport to help calm the nerves of tense travellers. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 14:45:40 GMT WOWOTFCR65LVLI34XMT7TONJGI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/therapy-dogs-comfort-passengers-stanbul-airport-2024-03-11/Reuters世界中东地区
Flowers, music and silence mark 20th anniversary of Madrid train bombingsSpain on Monday marked the 20th anniversary of Europe's deadliest Islamist militant attacks with flowers, music and silence in several ceremonies to remember the train bombings in Madrid. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 14:16:22 GMT K5YZKIK5MZLJ3IVGLU7DRZHEBY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/flowers-music-silence-mark-20th-anniversary-madrid-train-bombings-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia arrests South Korean man for spying, TASS saysA South Korean citizen has been arrested in Russia on suspicion of espionage, Russian state news agency TASS reported on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 14:06:05 GMT G4YDHV33BVJKNCSUITFERENCETM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-arrests-south-korean-man-spying-tass-says-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Nigerian army hunts for kidnapped students, parents seek answersNigerian soldiers were on Monday hunting for armed kidnappers who seized nearly 300 school pupils in Kaduna state last week, a security source said, as distraught parents sought answers on when they would be reunited with their children. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 13:45:56 GMT SLACFGQFTVJRZPSAQNXKJE4BAU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigerian-army-hunts-kidnapped-students-parents-seek-answers-2024-03-11/Garba Muhammad, Hamza Ibrahim世界非洲
UN chief calls for Gaza truce, massive lifesaving aid deliveriesUnited Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres on Monday called for a truce in the Israel-Hamas war in the Gaza Strip and the conflict in Sudan as the holy Muslim fasting month of Ramadan begins. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 13:42:35 GMT 2ZHR76N6ARPLJOUVHCERYPOOMY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-chief-calls-gaza-truce-massive-life saving-aid-deliveries-2024-03-11/Reuters世界中东地区
Greta Thunberg, other climate activists block Swedish parliament entrancesGreta Thunberg and dozens of other environmental campaigners blocked the main entrances to Sweden's parliament on Monday in a sit-down protest against the effects of climate change and what they said was political inaction. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 13:08:03 GMT BNLLHNNGR5MYLJYBM5POBIBZBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greta-thunberg-other-climate-activists-block-swedish-parliament-entrances-2024-03-11/Ilze Filks可持续发展气候与能源
India moves before election to implement citizenship law opposed by MuslimsIndia announced rules on Monday to implement a 2019 citizenship law that critics call anti-Muslim, weeks before Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeks a rare third term for his Hindu nationalist government. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:47:02 GMT YHIS4DXEYNONVB7NPKY5SRY4XE https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-moves-to-implement-citizenship-law-opposed-by-muslims-weeks-before-election-2024-03-11/Rajesh Prabhuswamy世界印度
Floods, landslides kill 26 in Indonesia, at least six missingFlooding and landslides in the Indonesian province of West Sumatra have killed 26 people and at least six are missing, authorities said on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 11:49:08 GMT YNYXTLU3JJLE7KEH3X7SNZSHL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/floods-landslides-kill-26-indonesia-ateast-six-missing-2024-03-11/Tri Iswanto商业环境
Israel checking reports that Hamas' military No.2 killed in Gaza strikeIsrael was checking on Monday if Hamas's second-highest military leader died in an air strike in Gaza, media said, as prospects faded of talks securing a ceasefire to coincide with the Muslim holy month of Ramadan. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 11:25:38 GMT O4PVRGHXZFLITKVN7J77U3EYQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-checking-reports-that-hamas-military-no-2-killed-gaza-strike-2024-03-11/Maayan Lubell, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
South Africa's ANC likely to lose parliamentary majority in May vote, survey showsSouth Africa's African National Congress (ANC) is likely to lose its parliamentary majority in May for the first time since Nelson Mandela led it to power at the fall of apartheid 30 years ago, a survey showed, opening up the prospect of coalition rule. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 10:56:23 GMT DUW5T35TBJOXDCZOJTOH7DSIZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/south-africas-anc-likely-to-lose-parliamentary-majority-may-vote-survey-shows-2024-03-11/Olivia Kumwenda-Mtambo世界非洲
